fbi 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Return a vector of all offenses in the NIBRS data.

list_nibrs_offenses.Rd

Return a vector of all offenses in the NIBRS data.

list_nibrs_offenses()

Value

A vector containing all permissible offenses to input to `get_nibrs_offenses()`, `get_nibrs_victim()`, and `get_nibrs_offender()`.`

Examples

list_nibrs_offenses()
#>  [1] "aggravated-assault"                                
#>  [2] "all-offenses"                                      
#>  [3] "all-other-larceny"                                 
#>  [4] "all-other-offenses"                                
#>  [5] "animal-cruelty"                                    
#>  [6] "arson"                                             
#>  [7] "assault-offenses"                                  
#>  [8] "assisting-or-promoting-prostitution"               
#>  [9] "bad-checks"                                        
#> [10] "betting"                                           
#> [11] "bribery"                                           
#> [12] "burglary-breaking-and-entering"                    
#> [13] "counterfeiting-forgery"                            
#> [14] "credit-card-automated-teller-machine-fraud"        
#> [15] "crime-against-person"                              
#> [16] "crime-against-property"                            
#> [17] "crime-against-society"                             
#> [18] "curfew-loitering-vagrancy-violations"              
#> [19] "destruction-damage-vandalism-of-property"          
#> [20] "driving-under-the-influence"                       
#> [21] "drug-equipment-violations"                         
#> [22] "drug-violations"                                   
#> [23] "drugs-narcotic-offenses"                           
#> [24] "drunkenness"                                       
#> [25] "embezzlement"                                      
#> [26] "extortion-blackmail"                               
#> [27] "false-pretenses-swindle-confidence-game"           
#> [28] "fondling"

#> [30] "gambling-equipment-violation"
